replies.body: The new client looks so sweet {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Why is this not on the boards?
It is! Sort of. [I've posted an explanation for the shift here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/J4nEdRTb-meanwhile-in-top-lanei-weekly-roundup-may-6).
Thank you for the clarification I was just wondering why it was here. But I like the change {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
The important thing is that it's not on the red tracker, which means I will probably miss it. The only reason I knew about it was your post.
sooo just finished a game top as garen against tryn ... and why is hes still able to ult after i silence him {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Is there going to be any answer on the queue ordeal?
I NEED THE NEW CLIENT NOWWWWW
